 Students 

 Application for
the AGH University students 

‘Welcome to AGH UST’ app is addressed to all international students who arrive at the campus for the first time and candidates willing to study at AGH University of Krakow. Its main goal is to help students to move about the AGH University Campus and provide them with indispensable information including opening hours of Deans’ offices, locations of the AGH University premises with the function of navigation, events, and news connected with student life, as well as information about Krakow and its spectacular attractions.

 Micro-guide for
the AGH University students
